answers.answer: My first son was born 37 weeks when born and he was healthy and got to go home 24 hrs later my second son was born at 38 weeks and same for him . Both my boys were around 7 lbs after 36 weeks there considered full term and depending on there health status is when the doc will decide if baby can go home or not when I went into labor for both it was natural and my doc had no concerns this time around I will have all my baby stuff prepared early and not wait for the 40 week to get stuff ready

question: Good evening ladies i have a question to see if this has happened to anyone. I was diagnosed with mild preeclampsia due to blood pressure at 31 weeks and since released have been good no close calls or anything. I had an ultrasound and they told me my baby boy has some fluid around his left kidney which they stated happens at time with boys and after delivery they are fine. But i was wondering is it safe to want to deliver at 40 weeks instead of 37 weeks if not what are some of the dangers in inducing to the mom and early delivery for the baby?
title: delivery at 37 weeks instead of 40 weeks?
